import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Button, Card, Col, Form, FormControl, FormGroup, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Select from "react-select"; import { useFormQuoter } from './Hooks/useFormQuoter'; const intialForm = { amountDebt: "" } const validationsForm = (form) => { } const FormDataQuoter = (props) => { // props const { onChange, onKeyPress, form } = props // hooks const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); // custom hooks const { form2, errors, loading, response, handleChange, handleBlur, handleSubmit, } = useFormQuoter(intialForm, validationsForm) const [amountDebt, setAmountDebt] = useState("") const [anualRate, setAnualRate] = useState("") const optionsConfirmation = [ { value: '1', label: 'Sí' }, { value: '2', label: 'No' } ] const optionsPayments = [ { value: '1', label: 'Mensual' }, { value: '2', label: 'Trimestral' }, { value: '3', label: 'Semestral' }, { value: '4', label: 'Anual' }, ] const optionsBanking = [ { value: '1', label: 'International Banking' }, { value: '2', label: 'Fuerza en venta' }, ] const handleChangeInput = (evt) => { const regexOnlyNum = new RegExp(/^[0-9]+$/) const regexOnlyNum2 = evt.target.value.replace(/[^0-9,.]/g, "") const valueAmountDebt = regexOnlyNum2; setAmountDebt(valueAmountDebt) } const handleChangeInput2 = (evt) => { const regexOnlyNum2 = evt.target.value.replace(/[^0-9,.]/g, "") const valueAnualRate = regexOnlyNum2; setAnualRate(valueAnualRate) } const handleKeyOnlyNum = (evt) => { const keyPress = evt.key; const regexOnlyNum = /^[0-9,.]+$/ if (!regexOnlyNum.test(keyPress)) return // console.log('here!'); } const handleTest = (bankingSelected) => { console.log(bankingSelected); } return ( {t("QuoterData")}
{t("Amount Debt")} handleKeyOnlyNum(evt)} onChange={onChange} >
{t("Anual Rate")}
{t("Effective Rate")}
{t("Feci")}
{t("Grace Period")}
{t("Amount Financed")}
{t("Initial Credit")}
{t("Monthly Bill")}
{t("Banking")}
